K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-1: aa mri ta ka la sha siddhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-4: dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-5: phan byed mgon la phyag 'tshal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-6: sgrub pa'i yul dang gnas bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-7: shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi'i ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-8: drang srong chen po'i sgrub lugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-9: phra men ma yi sbyar lugs dang; ;rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i yul khams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-10: shing dang nags kyi lha mo'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-11: ri bor sman ljongs tsandan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-12: bzhugs pa'i gnas su bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-13: dug rnams bdud rtsir sbyar ba'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-14: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-15: ra sa yan lag sogs rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318a-16: tshang bar bsags nas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-0: ri bor nags 'dabs chu ngogs @318b sam; ;brag phug stong pa thibs po'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-1: sgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-2: sa gzhi rab tu brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-3: mnyam zhing snum pa'i sa snga can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-4: zug rdo srin brag med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-5: tsha sgo sa dang ba tshva med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-6: ma grum ma gas mnyam po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-7: sgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-8: rang byung khro bo chen po bcus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-9: phyogs mtsham sphur pa btab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-10: gnas dang sa gzhi dag par sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-11: aom badzra k'i la ya mah'a kro dha h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-13: ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-14: da ha da ha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-15: pa tsa pa tsa h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-17: hu lu hu lu h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-21: spho ta ya spho ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-22: phyogs bcu dag tu mtshams bcad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-23: sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-24: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya; ;dri sna lnga dang rakta yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-25: byugs pa'i mandal bzang du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-26: ba su ta yi rgyu phreng gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-27: thig ni bcu drug char yang gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-28: de la thig le bcu drug gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-29: yang na phyag mtshan bcu drug dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-30: de'i dbus su bzhag pa'i snod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-31: thod pa ma gas ma chag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-32: yang na rus sbal mgo yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-33: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-34: bdud rtsi sna grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-35: btags te thod pa'i nang du dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-36: 'khor lo lte ba'i dbus su gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-37: phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rnams su yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:318b-38: snod ni bzhi 'am brgyad bzhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-0: @319a *// rigs dang kha dog mthun pa'i dar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-1: bandha lnga yi kha nas dag ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-2: yang na bum pa'i mgul chings bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-3: ra sa yan la sogs rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-4: ji snyed 'byor pas ma lus kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-5: dkyil 'khor de la bskor te gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-6: de bzhin dar dkar mthing yol gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-8: dkyil 'khor grva bzhir mda' bzhi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-9: me long bzhi dang ratna bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-10: ral gri bzhi dang phur pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-12: ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-14: de nyid byang chub sems su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-16: byang chub sems las rim bzhin bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-18: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-19: gzhal yas gsal bar 'gyur bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-20: dbus su byang chub sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-21: shar du rdo rje dri chen tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-22: lho ru mam sa sha sna tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-24: byang du dri chu sna tshogs ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-25: 'di rnams rim bzhin bkod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-26: gtso bos sbyor ba tshul bzhin bgyis nas me long yu ba can gyi steng du byang chub kyi sems blangs te dbus kyi snod blangs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te byang chub sems kyis g-yab cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319a-28: byang chub sems 'di'i ye shes rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-0: dri med rnam @319b dag char bzhin bab pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-1: 'gro ba kun skyed yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-2: gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-3: gnyis med sbyor bas rdo rje'i rigs chen 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-4: me long ye shes de nyid yin par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-6: dbus kyi bandha'i nang du shel phor bzhag la byang chub sems thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-8: go ro tsa na la sogs pa kun bsdus la blugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-9: dgu ya lag gi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-10: de yi steng du bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-11: sgrub pa po kun kha shar phyogs su bltas te byang chub kyi sems kyis g-yab cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-16: aa mri ta su ka ma h'a yo ga h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-19: aaksho bhya: de sha ra ti sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod nas dbus su blugs la gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-20: lho phyogs su kha bltas te mah'a mam sa'i snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-21: sems can rnams ni gnas la chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-22: nor bas bdag nyid gtsang mar 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-23: don gyis sun ni ma phyung na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-24: bsod nams thams cad dang bral ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-25: yi dvags skam thag chad pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-26: bdag lus gtong bar mi phod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-27: lha la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-28: lus can rnams la smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-29: de bas 'di kun sun dbyung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-30: rang byung bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-31: lhas kyang lha yi bdag nyid bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:319b-32: mi la sogs pa de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-0: @320a *// rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad cing bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-2: blang dor med par grol ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-3: mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-4: thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-5: bde gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-6: aom a'a:h'um ma h'a mam sa sa ma ya ra ho ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-7: ratna ra ti sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-8: rin po che'i rigs yab yum spyan drang zhing brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-10: sha sna tshogs bstabs shing lhor gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-11: kha nub phyogs su bltas te rakta sna tshogs kyi snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-13: smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-14: chags yul bde ba'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-16: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-18: nub phyogs kyi snod kyi nang du blugs la gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-19: aom a'a:h'um ma h'a padma rakta mu la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-20: aa mri ta bha ra ga ra ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-21: sa ma ya h'um su ka hri zhes brjod de nub phyogs su gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-22: kha byang phyogs su bltas te dri chu'i snod blangs nas 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-23: kun 'byung zag pa gur gum chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-24: rdo rje dri yi chu yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-25: chu las ma byung gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-26: las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-27: nan tan ye shes mchog kyang 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320a-28: aom a'a:h'um aa mo gha siddhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-0: badzra ra ti sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de byang @320b phyogs su gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-1: shar gyi snod dang dri chen blangs te 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-2: smad pa mi gtsang snyigs ma 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-3: rtog pa de nyid snyigs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-4: tshe mchog 'dzin pa'i bdud rtsi ste; ;gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-5: bde gshegs kun gyi thugs dam nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-6: gnyis med sku ru sbyor bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-7: chos dbyings ye shes dam tshig 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-8: aom bee ro tsa na mo ha ra ti sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-9: ma h'a yo ga aa ti spa ra na ba ling+ te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-10: aa mri ta au tsi tha aa dhi tishtha aom zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-11: de nas sgrub pa po kun gyis thal mo sbyar te dbus kyi snod yum gyis blangs te 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-12: ye shes snying po can rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-14: snying po chos kyi don las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-15: byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-16: smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-17: gcig la yon tan lnga lnga 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-18: gcig la'ang yon tan gsum du dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-19: dam tshig rtsa ba bco lnga yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-20: yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-21: snod bcud dbus su bsdus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-22: bcu drug por yang bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-23: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-24: sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs su blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-25: rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-26: rdzas ni sems dpa' bcu drug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-27: snod dbyings sems ma bcu drug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-28: 'khor lo rtsi bas ni bcu drug kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:320b-29: rang bzhin mi gnyis dbyings gcig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-2: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-3: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-5: rgyu yang gsang la 'bras bu'ang gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-6: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-7: mdzod ldan dpal gyi phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-8: kha 'byed rdo rje phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-9: 'khor lo rtsibs kyi dbus su gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-10: bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-11: mig dang rna ba sna dang lce //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-12: mtshan dang rnam shes yul bar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-13: 'dus la ma byas rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-14: dgongs pa 'dus pas rdo rjer bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-15: rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyar nas; ;rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-16: aom a'a:h'um sarba banytsa aa mri ta badzra satva h'um zhes brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-17: bdud rtsi rnam lnga byin gyis brlab cing bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-18: de nam yang rtsa ba brgyan dang yan lag stong du 'dus shing sbyar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-20: de nas yang snod stong par rgun chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-25: chang sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-26: 'bru rnams la yang chang med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-27: chu la chang gi rang bzhin med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-28: mkhas pas 'bru dang chur sbyar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-30: chang byin gyis brlab ba'i sngags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-31: aom aa mri ta dza gad bra ba sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321a-33: sman chang du blugs la dkrug pa'i sngags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-0: mu sa la mu sa @321b la; ;ro mchog go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-1: mi gtsang ba la'ang gtsang ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-2: man ngag can gyi sgrub pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-3: mkhas pas gnyis med sbyar bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-4: mnyam pa nyid kyi don thob 'gyur; ;kro dhi shva ri sho dha ya sam sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-5: yang 'o ma sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-6: rta dang mi la sogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-7: ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-8: mkhas ldan chen pos rab sbyar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-9: yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-10: de bzhin rdzas rnams bsgyur bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-11: mnyam nyid yon tan mar ltar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-12: ces brjod de byang chub sems kyi snod du sbreng ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-13: de nas rin po che sna tshogs brdar zhing 'di skad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-14: dper na gser dang rin chen ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-15: gcig tu bsres dang so sor gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-16: so sor gnas kyang rang rang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-17: kha dog mtshan nyid so sor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-18: rin chen yon tan de 'dra yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-19: bsdus nas yon tan rmad du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-20: de bas gnyis spras mdzes par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-21: de bzhin rdzas kyi yon tan yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-22: rang gi yon tan rin chen snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-23: gnyis med mnyam par sbyar bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-24: bla med yon tan rmad du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-25: thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-26: de nas bdud rtsi ra sa yan sna tshogs bsdus te snod stong par chu sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-27: chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-28: rgya mtshor phyin na lan tshva'i ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-29: de dag thams cad bsdus pa'i dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:321b-30: rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-0: @322a *// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-1: 'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-2: sman dang bdud rtsi rnam lnga po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-3: 'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-4: thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-5: dngos po med las dngos grub blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-6: byang chub sems kyi sprin yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-7: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-8: de skad ces brjod de sman lag tu blangs nas ngos ngos nas sman che ba'i yon tan brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-9: rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-10: rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-12: rtsa ba 'bum brag yangs pa'i bcud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-13: gnyis med bde chen las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-14: byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-15: sha chen mchod pa rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-16: zas mchog tshe yi dri chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-17: padma me tog yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-18: rdo rje chu ste bdud rtsi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-19: ga bur shel gyi spos phor bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-20: rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-21: yon tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-22: rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-23: ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-24: rgyud lnga sems can kun bsgral ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-25: dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-26: thams cad rnal 'byor bdud rtsi che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-27: ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-28: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-29: gcig tu dpa' bo ro rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322a-30: gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-0: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams @322b cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-1: rgyal brgya mtsho rnams la mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-3: de nas shes rab yum rnams kyis sman lag tu bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-4: yang bkra shis pa don la dam pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-5: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-6: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-7: rnam par mi rtog snang ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-8: kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-10: sman snod bcud chas par lag tu blangs la yum gyi gtso bo la bdud rtsi phul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-11: gtso bos blangs te phyag rgya chen por bsgyur zhing bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-12: de nas sgrub pa po'i gtso bos dpal chas su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-13: ba yang nyo ba ti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-14: ba yang shang gi ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-16: thal chen gyi thig les brgyan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-17: sro tsa aam dza na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-18: dgug cing g-yab pa'i dam rdzas mchog gi ha sta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-20: shun chen gyi 'breng ba 'dre brdab pa'i lcag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-21: rkang gi gling bu 'bud cing ku sha'i glu blang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-23: shun chen gyi g-yang gzhi bting la gu gul gyi 'go ma yeng gis bskus la rakta'i thig le dgu byas te mtshon re re'i steng du ta krid brgyad gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-24: by'a ghri tshar ma'i g-yang gzhi ta gis gyon la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-25: mdung la ba dan 'phyar nas thogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-26: dkyil 'khor yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su zla gam dmar po gcig bris nas de'i steng du sman spungs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:322b-27: sgrub pa po yab yum yang sbyor ba tshul bzhin du bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-0: lha mo bcu drug gi bsnyen pa brgya rtsa @323a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-3: dbab pa'i phyag rgya yang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-4: g-yab mo'i brda la sogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-6: thabs kyi rdo rje badzra sha ri ram la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-7: yang na mchog gi lag pa g-yon gyis sman dgug cing g-yab cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-8: mkhar gzhong gi nang du bsres te btsags la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-9: sman bandha'i nang du blugs la rdo rjes dkrug cing glu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-12: dam pa'i tshig gis bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-13: spos kyis bdug cing gar gyi bro thags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-14: rdo rje 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor du bdud rtsi dbus su bzhag la bskor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-15: de nas ngos ngos nas kyang che ba'i yon tan brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-16: yang zhi ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-17: rigs so so'i yig 'bru kun sman la bstim zhing 'di brjod do; ;aom aa mri ta sarba mah'a yo ga h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-18: aom badzra sarba ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-19: aom mah'a sarba aa mri ta mah'a su ka hri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-24: badzra aa mri ta h'um hr'i tha zhes rab tu yang bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-27: me'i phud kyang nang du blugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-28: de nas sems sbyang ba'i sman /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323a-38: ra sa ya na ta na dza ya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-0: khrus @323b mkhan au ba li'i thig les brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-1: gdod sman bsre zhing sbyar nas dkrugs la bandhar stsal te bandha gnyis kha sbyar la dar gyis bcings la mtshams su rgyas btab la gzod dkyil 'khor zlag ma gyi dbus su gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-2: sngags dgu pa 'dzab tu drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-3: 'di'i mgo mjug tu tshogs kyi mchod pa bar mi gcad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-4: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'phro 'du yang bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-6: sbyar thabs bstan pa'i lung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-7: las kyi rim pa'i skul tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-8: yo byad du byas pa'i rnam pa bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-012:323b-9: bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung gi bam po bdud rtsi 'bum sde las 'byung ba'i don bam bo chen po bdun pa'o ////
